languages.text: "И наконец Домин'{name} почтил{mf||а} нас визитом, и мы приветствуем {mf|его|ее}. Был момент сей предопределен — кровь должна была Домин привести в обитель смерти. Пусть не алые следы той, кто первой соткал паутину, но кровь генетических выродков путь указала... Да, сие тоже угодно Неумирающему".

"At last has Domin'{name} honoured us with a visit, and we welcome {mf|his|her} arrival. This was preordained — blood was meant to lead the Domin to death's abode. Yet it was not the scarlet trail of she who first spun the Web, but rather, the blood of aberrations that guided {mf|his|her} way... Yes, this still pleases the Undying One."
languages.original_text: "И наконец Домин'{name} почтил{mf||а} нас визитом, и мы приветствуем {mf|его|ее}. Был момент сей предопределен — кровь должна была Домин привести в обитель смерти. Пусть не алые следы той, кто первой соткал паутину, но кровь генетических выродков путь указала... Да, сие тоже угодно Неумирающему".

traits.locale_text: "At last has Domin'{name} honoured us with a visit, and we welcome {mf|his|her} arrival. This was preordained — blood was meant to lead the Domin to death's abode. Though it was not the scarlet trail of she who first spun the Web — it was instead the blood of anathemas that guided {mf|his|her} way... Yes, this still pleases the Undying One."

"At last has Domin'{name} honoured us with a visit, and we welcome {mf|his|her} arrival. This was preordained — blood was meant to lead the Domin to death's abode. Yet it was not the scarlet trail of she who first spun the Web, but rather, the blood of aberrations that guided {mf|his|her} way... Yes, this still pleases the Undying One."

languages.text: «Por fin, Domin'{name} nos honra con su visita y l{mf|e|a} recibimos con los brazos abiertos. Tal y como estaba presagiado, la sangre conduciría a{mf|l| la} Domin a los aposentos de la muerte. Sin embargo, no ha sido el rastro escarlata de la tejedora original de la Red, sino de la sangre de aberraciones, lo que ha guiado su camino... Sí, esto también complace al Inmortal».
languages.original_text: "At last has Domin'{name} honoured us with a visit, and we welcome {mf|his|her} arrival. This was preordained — blood was meant to lead the Domin to death's abode. Yet it was not the scarlet trail of she who first spun the Web, but rather, the blood of aberrations that guided {mf|his|her} way... Yes, this still pleases the Undying One."

traits.locale_text: «Por fin, Domin'{name} nos honra con su visita y l{mf|e|a} recibimos con los brazos abiertos. Tal y como estaba presagiado, la sangre conduciría a{mf|l| la} Domin a los aposentos de la muerte. Sin embargo, no ha sido el rastro escarlata de la tejedora original de la Red, sino de la sangre de aberraciones, lo que ha guiado su camino... Sí, esto también complace al Inmortal».

languages.text: 「ついにドミン{name}が我々を訪問してくれた。そして、私達は{mf|彼|彼女}の到着を待つ。血はドミンを死の住処へと導くものだった。しかし、最初にウェブを紡いだ彼女の緋色の軌跡ではなく、むしろ忌まわしきものの血が{mf|彼|彼女}の道を導いたのだ…。そう、これは今も不死の者を喜ばせている」
languages.original_text: "At last has Domin'{name} honoured us with a visit, and we welcome {mf|his|her} arrival. This was preordained — blood was meant to lead the Domin to death's abode. Yet it was not the scarlet trail of she who first spun the Web, but rather, the blood of aberrations that guided {mf|his|her} way... Yes, this still pleases the Undying One."

traits.locale_text: 「ついにドミン{name}が我々を訪問してくれた。そして、私達は{mf|彼|彼女}の到着を待つ。血はドミンを死の住処へと導くものだった。しかし、最初にウェブを紡いだ彼女の緋色の軌跡ではなく、むしろ忌まわしきものの血が{mf|彼|彼女}の道を導いたのだ…。そう、これは今も不死の者を喜ばせている」

languages.text: “秘者{name}终于造访了这间圣殿，让这里蓬荜生辉。我们欢迎秘者的来访，这是命中注定的相遇，鲜血注定会将秘者引领至死亡的圣殿。然而，指引秘者的并不是最初的织网者猩红色的足迹，而是怪物的鲜血……但即便如此，秘者的造访依然会令不死之神欣喜不已。”
languages.original_text: "At last has Domin'{name} honoured us with a visit, and we welcome {mf|his|her} arrival. This was preordained — blood was meant to lead the Domin to death's abode. Yet it was not the scarlet trail of she who first spun the Web, but rather, the blood of aberrations that guided {mf|his|her} way... Yes, this still pleases the Undying One."

traits.locale_text: “秘者{name}终于造访了这间圣殿，让这里蓬荜生辉。我们欢迎秘者的来访，这是命中注定的相遇，鲜血注定会将秘者引领至死亡的圣殿。然而，指引秘者的并不是最初的织网者猩红色的足迹，而是怪物的鲜血……但即便如此，秘者的造访依然会令不死之神欣喜不已。”

languages.text: "Endlich beehrt uns Domin'{name} mit einem Besuch, und wir begrüßen {mf|seine|ihre} Ankunft. Es war vorherbestimmt – Blut sollte {mf|den|die} Domin zur Heimstatt des Todes führen. Dennoch war es nicht die rote Spur der ersten Netzspinnerin, sondern das Blut von Abscheulichkeiten, die {mf|seinen|ihren} Weg leiteten ... Ja, das bereitet dem Todlosen dennoch Freude."
languages.original_text: "At last has Domin'{name} honoured us with a visit, and we welcome {mf|his|her} arrival. This was preordained — blood was meant to lead the Domin to death's abode. Yet it was not the scarlet trail of she who first spun the Web, but rather, the blood of aberrations that guided {mf|his|her} way... Yes, this still pleases the Undying One."

traits.locale_text: "Endlich beehrt uns Domin'{name} mit einem Besuch, und wir begrüßen {mf|seine|ihre} Ankunft. Es war vorherbestimmt – Blut sollte {mf|den|die} Domin zur Heimstatt des Todes führen. Dennoch war es nicht die rote Spur der ersten Netzspinnerin, sondern das Blut von Abscheulichkeiten, die {mf|seinen|ihren} Weg leiteten ... Ja, das bereitet dem Todlosen dennoch Freude."

languages.text: « {mf|Le|La} Domin'{name} nous fait enfin l'honneur de sa présence, et son arrivée est plus que bienvenue. Il était écrit que le sang {mf|le|la} mènerait jusqu'à l'antre de la mort. Pour autant, ce n'est pas le sillage écarlate de la toute première tisseuse de la Toile qui l'a {mf|guidé|guidée}, mais le sang des aberrations... Quoi qu'il en soit, la volonté de l'Immortel est faite. »
languages.original_text: "At last has Domin'{name} honoured us with a visit, and we welcome {mf|his|her} arrival. This was preordained — blood was meant to lead the Domin to death's abode. Yet it was not the scarlet trail of she who first spun the Web, but rather, the blood of aberrations that guided {mf|his|her} way... Yes, this still pleases the Undying One."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Le|La} Domin'{name} nous fait enfin l'honneur de sa présence, et son arrivée est plus que bienvenue. Il était écrit que le sang {mf|le|la} mènerait jusqu'à l'antre de la mort. Pour autant, ce n'est pas le sillage écarlate de la toute première tisseuse de la Toile qui l'a {mf|guidé|guidée}, mais le sang des aberrations... Quoi qu'il en soit, la volonté de l'Immortel est faite. »

languages.text: "En nihayetinde Domin'{name} bizi ziyaretiyle onurlandırdı. Biz de onun gelişini memnuniyetle karşılıyoruz. Domin, tıpkı önceden belirlendiği gibi kanın kılavuzluğunda ölümün meskenine ulaşmalıydı. Ancak ona bu yolda kılavuzluk eden, Ağ'ı ilk örenin kan kızılı izi olmadı. O, sapkıların kanını takip etti... Evet, Ölmeyen bundan da memnun."
languages.original_text: "At last has Domin'{name} honoured us with a visit, and we welcome {mf|his|her} arrival. This was preordained — blood was meant to lead the Domin to death's abode. Yet it was not the scarlet trail of she who first spun the Web, but rather, the blood of aberrations that guided {mf|his|her} way... Yes, this still pleases the Undying One."
